text: Thomas "Red" Imrie (15 July 1937 - 24 August 2020) was a British ice hockey defender. He played in the United Kingdom during the 1950s and 1960s. He also played for the Great Britain national team between 1961 and 1966. Imrie was honored into the British Ice Hockey Hall of Fame in 1987. Imrie died on 24 August 2020 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *A to Z Encyclopaedia of Ice Hockey *Ice Hockey Journalists UK Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scottish ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Falkirk
title: Thomas Imrie
